Package it.polimi.ingsw.connection.server

Class ServerConnection

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.connection.server.ServerConnection
public class ServerConnection
extends java.lang.Object
This class handle connection aspects of the distributed application. It is used by the Server as a "Network Handler" to forward and receive messages and data to/from Clients.
Author:
AndreaAltomare
See Also:
github.com/emanueledelsozzo/.../Server.java

      Constructor (Initialization of ServerSocket).
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Multi-client connection management.

    • registerConnection

      public void registerConnection​(ClientConnection c)
      Register connection.
      Parameters:
      c - (Server-Client communication Socket)

    • unregisterConnection

      public void unregisterConnection​(ClientConnection c)
      Unregister connection.
      Parameters:
      c - (Server-Client communication Socket)

    • lobby

      public void lobby​(ClientConnection c, java.lang.String nickname)
      If the waiting list has reached the requested number of Players, create a lobby and prepare the game. If a lobby has been already created, inform the Player he/she cannot join now.
      Parameters:
      c - (Server-Client communication Socket)
      nickname - (Player's nickname)

    • addClient

      public boolean addClient​(ClientConnection c, java.lang.String nickname)
      If the nickname provided for the Client is not taken yet, register the Client connection.
      Parameters:
      c - (Client connection)
      nickname - (Provided nickname)
      Returns:
      (Client connection was registered ? true : false)

    • nicknameTaken

      public boolean nicknameTaken​(java.lang.String nickname)
      Tell if there is a Player connection with the provided nickname.
      Parameters:
      nickname - (Provided nickname)
      Returns:
      (Provided nickname is already taken ? true : false)

    • getNumberOfPlayers

      public int getNumberOfPlayers()

    • setNumberOfPlayers

      public void setNumberOfPlayers​(int numberOfPlayers)

    • sendAll

      public void sendAll​(java.lang.Object o)
      Sends an Object to all playing clients.
      Parameters:
      o - Object-message to send

    • sendAll

      public void sendAll​(java.lang.Object o, ClientConnection sender)
      Sends an Object to all playing clients but the sender one.
      Parameters:
      o - Object-message to send
      sender - Client who sent the message

    • quitAndReset

      public boolean quitAndReset​(ClientConnection c)
      If the game has already started and the Client who quit was a playing player: quits the connection with every Client and resets the Server to accept new ones; else: do not reset the Server.
      Parameters:
      c - Connection of the Client who quit
      Returns:
      True if all connection have been closed and the Server has been reset.

    • reset

      private void reset()
      Reset the Server in order to be ready to start a new game with new Players (Clients).

    • quit

      private void quit()
      Notify Clients that the connection is being closed, then close the connections.

    • closeConnections

      private void closeConnections()
      Close the connection with every playing Player's Client.

    • notifyClients

      private void notifyClients()
      Notify every playing Client about the imminent connection closing.
